archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1085
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be able to request service upgrade in my area and see if others in my area have also requested (either bad reception in an area or fesitval concert, event), so that I can help Vodafone to improve the network experience in my area

properties.value: cannot understand this BUC, is it related with conversion? gathering some feedback?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
